function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Exacerbation of existing bias in social research in energy associated with the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Loss of validity in social research in energy associated with the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limits on research approaches during the pandemic may result in important gaps in knowledge generation.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Direct applicability of the paper may be limited due to the pandemic situation.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential limited effectiveness of a single intervention in reducing virus transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing optimal mitigation policies to reduce peak healthcare demand and deaths.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of overwhelming health systems due to high transmission rates and uncontrolled epidemic growth.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The spread of covid-19 due to ineffective suppression measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact on health systems due to school and university closures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term feasibility and sustainability of suppression measures","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmissibility rebounded once controls were lifted, leading to a resurgence of cases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Building population immunity through epidemic without interrupting transmission completely.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertain understanding of sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in people’s response to npis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High social and density contact points","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assumption of per-capita contacts within schools being double those elsewhere, potentially leading to higher risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Under-ascertainment of infections 40-50%","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumption of short-term immunity after risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overall mean duration of hospitalisation of 10.4 days","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ifr estimates at 0.9% 95% credible interval 0.4%-1.4%","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncontrolled spread of infectious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumptions leading to underestimation of risks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unmitigated epidemic with predicted deaths","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exceeding critical care bed capacity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in initiating social distancing and closure of schools
